docs.text: Welcome to when-exactly Work with dates and time the same way you think about dates and times. Rationale When we think about dates and times, we think in terms of years , months , weeks , days , hours , minutes , etc. When-Exactly is a library that aims to bring these types into the hands of developers, so they can write more expressive and functional date/time code. Overview >>> import when_exactly as we >>> year = we.year(2025) >>> year.iso() '2025' >>> month = year.month(1) >>> month.iso() '2025-01' >>> day = we.day(2025, 12, 25) >>> day.iso() '2025-12-25' >>> day.month().iso() '2025-12' >>> year.months().iso() '[2025-01,2025-02,2025-03,2025-04,2025-05,2025-06,2025-07,2025-08,2025-09,2025-10,2025-11,2025-12]' >>> month.days()[0:-1:5].iso() '[2025-01-01,2025-01-06,2025-01-11,2025-01-16,2025-01-21,2025-01-26]'
docs.title: Welcome to when-exactly
